categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode I Adventures novels

nodes.text: Episode I Adventures 14: Podrace to Freedom
Episode I Adventures 14: Podrace to Freedom was the fourteenth installment of Star Wars Episode I Adventures.
Anakin Skywalker is a slave on the planet Tatooine. When a band of visitors needs a way to leave Tatooine, he offers to help.
His only hope is to win the most dangerous Podrace of his life.
